title: launcher dosent work
body: hi there so before the new updated client league was working for me but all of a sudden as I update the old client to new client I open lol and click launch and nothing happens I have had this problem since the new client came on live servers pls help me

replies.body: Your settings may have changed with the update, and isn't configured to allow the client to launch.  Check out the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure access is allowed.  Hopefully, that will do the trick!
